titles.title: Finish the Arkansas Valley Conduit Act
Finish the Arkansas Valley Conduit Act
Finish the Arkansas Valley Conduit Act
To make certain modifications to the repayment for the Arkansas Valley Conduit in the State of Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-187.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 152.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
